events.title: Sonny Liston dies of a heroin overdose

movie.title: Phantom Punch
movie.plot: From his discovery by a priest while serving time at the Missouri State Penitentiary to the infamous 'Phantom Punch' by Cassius Clay which effectively ended his career, the movie spans the years from 1950 to Liston's mysterious and untimely death in 1971.

events.title: a group of friends' annual month long game of tag begins

movie.title: Tag
movie.plot: For one month every year, five highly competitive friends hit the ground running in a no-holds-barred game of tag they’ve been playing since the first grade. This year, the game coincides with the wedding of their only undefeated player, which should finally make him an easy target. But he knows they’re coming...and he’s ready.

events.title: Donna Rice is followed to a house where she meets Gary Hart

movie.title: The Front Runner
movie.plot: Gary Hart, former Senator of Colorado, becomes the front-runner for the Democratic presidential nomination in 1987. Hart's intelligence, charisma and idealism makes him popular with young voters, leaving him with a seemingly clear path to the White House. All that comes crashing down when allegations of an extramarital affair surface in the media, forcing the candidate to address a scandal that threatens to derail his campaign and personal life.

movie.title: Senna
movie.plot: Senna's remarkable story, charting his physical and spiritual achievments on the track and off, his quest for perfection, and the mythical status he has since attained, is the subject of Senna, a documentary feature that spans the racing legend's years as an F1 driver, from his opening season in 1984 to his untimely death a decade later.
movie.awards: Won 2 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 18 wins & 19 nominations.

events.title: Jamie Lyn Dennis and Michael Gianako kill Anne Marie Camp

movie.title: I Killed My BFF
movie.plot: A friendship between two young mothers results in murder when one develops an attraction to the other's boyfriend.

movie.title: 127 Hours
movie.plot: The true story of mountain climber Aron Ralston's remarkable adventure to save himself after a fallen boulder crashes on his arm and traps him in an isolated canyon in Utah.
movie.awards: Nominated for 6 Oscars. Another 23 wins & 144 nominations.

events.title: George Bush gives his Mission Accomplished speech

movie.title: W.
movie.plot: The story of the eventful life of George W. Bush—his struggles and triumphs, how he found both his wife and his faith—and the critical days leading up to his decision to invade Iraq.

movie.title: The Wicker Man
movie.plot: Police sergeant Neil Howie is called to an island village in search of a missing girl whom the locals claim never existed. Stranger still, however, are the rituals that take place there.
